Name: Lux
Review Text: The short man at the bar is rude and incompetent. They had a cocktail menu but yet he was somehow insulted when my friend asked if she could have a margarita, which wasn’t on the menu. He was incredibly rude so we cancelled our order and left. There are many places within 2 mins walk of here that offer better service.

Name: Lux
Review Text: Describing the service in this bar as terrible would be a compliment. The girl at the bar and someone that acted like the owner or manager were so rude and aggressive that we decided to leave. Trendy place, unfortunately to avoid. You can have average drinks everywhere

Name: Lux
Review Text: Great drinks, ambiance & staff

Name: Lux
Review Text: I really like this place. It's the pretty sister bar of Bar Weber two doors down. Very busy on weekends however it's always possible to find a table or a nook to sit and sip away at a beer. The bar can be more tricky to reach since there's …

Name: Lux
Review Text: The bar looks great, the music is good too and the design of the menu is really nice , makes me think of Barbarella. But the mixed drinks are disappointing...and the tequila shots I ordered were not best quality... It is a nice place though to go with friends.

Name: Lux
Review Text: Rock music bar which we did not expect. We were told the place has good parties and an exciting ambiance. Instead we were welcomed by a more intimate air with no room to fraternise with people. Rooms and deco are nice, space is small but on …

Name: Lux
Review Text: Pretty nice bar.

Name: Lux
Review Text: Bar lux & Weber is a well known bar, if you need to meet up for drinks in the middle of the week it's a perfect spot the venue is always open. The service is decent and interior always cozy. Good for tourist and locals

Name: Lux
Review Text: Very hipster bar with crowds of people. This place just has an atmosphere that I admire, it feels comfortable to chill and drink here even though there are always so many people, but I could do with less people. Cafe Lux is one of my go to bars in Amsterdam with friends.

Name: Lux
Review Text: Good selection of beers. Nice gin tonics cocktails. The atmosphere is very nice. There's a floor downstairs and two places to order the drinks. Definitely recommend it!
